title: The Door
text: You approach a closed Door made from a reddish stone at the edge of the room.
Trying to open the door proves futile.
You do find, however, a small screen and four buttons to the right of the door, with markings on them.
Fidgeting with these buttons, you see that pressing them makes the screen print '-', up to four times,
After which the screen shuts down and the characters disapear.

buttons.text: Go back to the center of the room
